description: Reckoning Augment: Health orbs become unusable by enemies for 2.5 seconds.

description: Reckoning Augment: Enemies affected by Reckoning spawn zones that increase armor by 150 for allies and inflicts 100 damage to enemies over 7 sec.
ExportUpgrades.name: Hallowed Reckoning

description: Teleport Augment: Teleport will perform a finisher on the target, dealing 125% extra damage. 50% of energy cost is refunded on a kill.
ExportUpgrades.name: Fatal Teleport

description: Smoke Screen Augment: Blinds enemies within 1 meters for 3 seconds.
ExportUpgrades.name: Tear Gas

description: Smoke Screen Augment: Conceals allies for 2 seconds.
ExportUpgrades.name: Smoke Shadow

description: Blade Storm Augment: Melee multiplier lasts 50% longer before it resets.
ExportUpgrades.name: Rising Storm

description: Shuriken Augment: Hits expose weaknesses on enemies, reducing their armor by 35% for 2 seconds.
ExportUpgrades.name: Seeking Shuriken

description: Fire Walker Augment: Accumulate 75% of the damage Fire Walker deals, unleashing it in a trail of fire that lasts 6s.
ExportUpgrades.name: Pyroclastic Flow

description: Warding Halo Augment: 35% of the casting cost returned based on how much protection is left.
ExportUpgrades.name: Ward Recovery

description: Warding Halo Augment: Can now be cast on allies with 20% effectiveness.
ExportUpgrades.name: Safeguard

description: Terrify Augment: Affected enemies have |SLOW_PCT|% reduced movement speed.
Terrify Augment: Affected enemies have 30% reduced movement speed.

description: Soul Punch Augment: Depletes up to 10 energy from the target.
ExportUpgrades.name: Discharge Strike

description: Soul Punch Augment: Use on a downed ally to revive him with 15% of health. Nekros's energy will be consumed.
ExportUpgrades.name: Soul Survivor

description: Desecrate Augment: No longer consumes energy, but consumes 16 health per corpse instead.
ExportUpgrades.name: Despoil

description: Shadows of the Dead Augment: Shadows within 50 meters each take 3% of the damage done to Nekros in his stead.
ExportUpgrades.name: Shield of Shadows

description: Primal Fury Augment: Killing an enemy increases Critical Chance by |CHANCE|%. The increase decays by |DECAY|% per second.
Primal Fury Augment: Killing an enemy increases Critical Chance by 6%. The increase decays by 1% per second.
ExportUpgrades.name: Primal Rage

description: Iron Jab Augment: Aiming Iron Jab at the ground launches Wukong into the air. Executing a slam attack increases range by |RANGE|m and applies |DAMAGE|% extra damage.
Iron Jab Augment: Aiming Iron Jab at the ground launches Wukong into the air. Executing a slam attack increases range by 8m and applies 300% extra damage.
ExportUpgrades.name: Iron Vault

description: Rift Surge Augment: Limbo deals 15% Extra Damage for each enemy affected by Rift Surge while in the rift.
ExportUpgrades.name: Rift Torrent

description: Cataclysm Augment: Duration increased by 0.3s for each enemy killed.
ExportUpgrades.name: Cataclysmic Continuum

description: Banish Augment: Allies banished to the rift will have 10% of their max health restored.
ExportUpgrades.name: Haven

description: Polarize Augment: Increases the time for the target's shields to regenerate by 4 seconds.
ExportUpgrades.name: Shield Overload

description: Polarize Augment: Mag gains 15% overshields from depleted enemy shields.
ExportUpgrades.name: Shield Transference

description: Pull Augment: Steals up to 10 energy from the target.
ExportUpgrades.name: Sapping Reach

description: Pull Augment: Adds 40% chance to pull pickups towards Mag.
ExportUpgrades.name: Greedy Pull

description: Crush Augment: Survivors have their armor decreased by 20% and become unable to move for 4 seconds.
ExportUpgrades.name: Fracturing Crush

description: Manually detonate Magnetize by recasting on the target. Enemies hit have a 20% chance to become disarmed.
ExportUpgrades.name: Magnetized Discharge

description: Switch Teleport Augment: After teleporting with an ally they will be invulnerable for 3 seconds.
ExportUpgrades.name: Safeguard Switch

description: Invisibility Augment: Weapon noise is reduced by 50% while invisible.
ExportUpgrades.name: Hushed Invisibility

description: Radial Disarm Augment: Enemies will be affected by Radiation for 4 seconds.
ExportUpgrades.name: Irradiating Disarm

description: Decoy Augment: 20% of damage Loki takes is transferred to Decoy, and vice versa.
ExportUpgrades.name: Deceptive Bond

description: Decoy Augment: If Loki takes fatal damage, Decoy absorbs the damage and swaps locations. Also increases casting speed of Decoy by |SPEED|%
Decoy Augment: If Loki takes fatal damage, Decoy absorbs the damage and swaps locations. Also increases casting speed of Decoy by 20%
ExportUpgrades.name: Savior Decoy

description: Absorb Augment: Creates a ring every 3 seconds that drags in enemies at 9 meters per second.
ExportUpgrades.name: Singularity

description: Absorb Augment: Nyx can move at 30% speed while using Absorb, but the area is reduced by half.
ExportUpgrades.name: Assimilate

description: Mind Control Augment: Controlled target does increased damage by 200%.
ExportUpgrades.name: Mind Freak

description: Psychic Bolts Augment: Affected enemies will be confused for 4 seconds.
ExportUpgrades.name: Pacifying Bolts

description: Chaos Augment: Enemies entering the effect range will be inflicted with Chaos. Effect range lasts for 25% of the ability duration and shrinks over time.

description: Prism Augment: Prism follows above Mirage for 1 seconds.
ExportUpgrades.name: Prism Guard

description: Sleight of Hand Augment: Ammo and orbs pickups are turned into proximity mines that deal 150 damage with a 15% proc chance.

description: Eclipse Augment: While active, allies within 3 meters gain 25% benefit from Eclipse.

description: Hall of Mirrors Augment: The damage of your doppelgangers is increased by 2% every time you kill an enemy.

description: Freeze Augment: Casting on allies will add 50% Cold damage to their attacks for 28 seconds.

description: Ice Wave Augment: Leaves a frozen trail for 6 seconds, that will slow down enemies that come into contact with it.

description: Snow Globe Augment: Enemies that enter have a 30% chance to become frozen solid for 4 seconds.

description: Avalanche Augment: Grants allies within the radius a coat of ice that absorbs |ABSORB| damage per enemy hit.
Avalanche Augment: Grants allies within the radius a coat of ice that absorbs 40 damage per enemy hit.
ExportUpgrades.name: Icy Avalanche

description: Lantern Augment: Attracted enemies take 25% more melee damage.
ExportUpgrades.name: Beguiling Lantern

description: Exalted Blade's damage type changes depending on energy color and status chance is increased by 25%.
ExportUpgrades.name: Chromatic Blade

description: Slash Dash Augment: Allies in the path of Slash Dash have 1 debuffs removed 100 shields restored.

description: Slash Dash Augment: Each enemy hit during Slash Dash further increases your melee counter by 1.
ExportUpgrades.name: Surging Dash

description: Radial Javelin Augment: Each enemy hit will increase Excalibur's melee damage by 3% for 6 seconds.

description: Radial Blind Augment: Enemies blinded are marked on the minimap for 3 seconds.

description: Radial Blind Augment: Blinded enemies take 150% more finisher damage.

description: World On Fire Augment: Enemies hit have a 50% chance of being knocked down.

description: Accelerant Augment: Accelerant gives +20% casting speed and +50% <DT_FIRE>Heat damage to allies within range.

description: Fire Blast Augment: Allies that enter the fire will have up to 1 debuffs removed.

description: Fire Blast Augment: Damage done by Fire Blast has a 40% chance to cause enemies to panic.

description: Fireball Augment: Casting on allies will add 50% Fire damage to their attacks for 28 seconds.

description: Vex Armor Augment: Taking 150 damage will trigger a 4m burst. Shield damage will cause a puncture proc while health damage will cause a blast proc.
ExportUpgrades.name: Vexing Retaliation

description: Cast and hold to make Effigy move to your aim point. Deals 500 damage per second to enemies in its path and roars on arrival stunning nearby enemies.
ExportUpgrades.name: Guided Effigy

description: Elemental Ward Augment: Allies that leave the radius will retain the effect for 50% of the remaining duration.
ExportUpgrades.name: Everlasting Ward

description: Spectral Scream Augment: Upon deactivation, Chroma will launch an elemental projectile dealing 25 damage for each second the ability was active, to a maximum of 200 damage.
ExportUpgrades.name: Afterburn

description: Shooting Gallery Augment: Does a burst before switching between players, blinding enemies within |RANGE| meters for |DURATION| seconds.

ExportUpgrades.name: Muzzle Flash

description: Shatter Shield Augment: Reflected bullets gain a |PROC_PCT|% chance of staggering enemies.
Shatter Shield Augment: Reflected bullets gain a 30% chance of staggering enemies.

description: Peacemaker Augment: Dodge roll while Peacemaker is active at the cost of 15 Energy
ExportUpgrades.name: Mesa's Waltz

description: Ballistic Battery Augment: Applies a |PROC_CHANCE|% status chance bonus to the shot, based on the amount charged.

description: Rumblers Augment: Atlas becomes a Rumbler with rock armor that can absorb up to 350 damage.

description: Rumblers Augment: Create a single rumbler with 120% health, 120% damage, and 50% speed that taunts nearby enemies into attacking it.

description: Landslide Augment: Leave a trail for 7s that petrifies enemies for 4s.

description: Petrify Augment: Petrified enemies are scanned into the codex and have a 20% chance to drop additional loot when killed.

description: Tectonics Augment: Create up to 2 walls with 70% health. Walls can no longer be turned into boulders.

description: Paralysis Augment: Affected enemies are pulled towards Valkyr and the stun duration is increased by 50%.

description: Hysteria Augment: While Hysteria is active, each kill restores 5% max shields.

description: Hysteria Augment: Use Secondary Fire to leap onto enemies up to 15m away.

description: Warcry Augment: While active, Warcry's duration is increased by 1.25 seconds for each melee kill.

description: Rip Line Augment: After using Rip Line, the next 1 Rip Lines will have no energy cost while airborne.

description: Sonar Augment: Killing an enemy by shooting the weak spot will trigger another Sonar for 50% of remaining duration.

description: Silence Augment: Finisher damage is increased by 150% while Silence is active.

description: Sonic Boom Augment: Enemy armor is reduced by 35% for 2 seconds.

description: Sound Quake Augment: Increase damage by 60, range by 0.5m and energy cost by 1, for every second this ability is active.

description: Cosmic Crush Augment: The black hole saps the area of heat, freezing enemies in range. Enemies near the black hole are completely frozen for |val| seconds.

description: Energy Shell Augment: Energy Shell applies to allies within 80m.
ExportUpgrades.name: Energy Field

description: Core Vent Augment: <DT_EXPLOSION>Blast damage ignites exhaust fumes for |DURATION|s. Enemies passing through the flames take |DAMAGE| <DT_FIRE>Heat damage.

description: Worm Hole Augment: Allies that travel through wormhole gain a 30% speed bonus for 4 seconds.

description: Null Star Augment: Recasting Null Star will make all remaining particles explode, doing 60 Blast area damage with guaranteed proc in 4 meters.

description: Antimatter Drop Augment: Creates a fully charged stationary orb that explodes after 12s or within enemy proximity.

description: Antimatter Drop Augment: Absorbs enemy bullets within 1 meters, increasing its damage when it explodes.
